title: Beau Joie Champagne Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, October 29, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for an elegant evening featuring Beau Joie, the Champagne house known for its striking copper-armored bottles and commitment to purity and precision. Explore three stunning expressions that capture the artistry and craftsmanship behind this luxury Champagne brand.

Tasting Fee: $30 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Beau Joie Brut Nature Champagne – Crafted from 60% Pinot Noir and 40% Chardonnay, this zero-dosage Champagne showcases citrus and green apple with a crisp, dry finish and beautiful minerality.

• Beau Joie Brut Rosé – 50% Pinot Noir, 50% Chardonnay – Elegant and vibrant, offering delicate notes of strawberry and rose petal with a refreshing, fruit-driven palate.

• Beau Joie Brut Champagne – Aged on lees for 4 years, this low-dosage Champagne balances lively citrus and orchard fruit with creamy texture and refined acidity.

Celebrate the beauty of balance and craftsmanship in every glass—experience Beau Joie at its finest.
